content:
The memory of the graduates of the Ponikovichi school, who died in the Russian-Ukrainian war, were perpetuated on the facade of the school building in the Brody community of Lviv region.

About thisinformsLviv Regional State Administration.

In the mournful memorable list of seven names:

  • Vitaliy Kit- A resident of the village of Ponokovytsya. In 2014 - 2015 he performed combat missions in the ATO area. And after the start of the full -scale war he returned to the ranks of the Armed Forces. A warrior died at the age of 51.
  • Mar’an Misak- Originally from the village of Kovpin of the Brody community. Marjan was a survey of the first mobile battalion of the 81st Separate Airmobile Brigade. He died on November 4, 2022 near the village of Bigorovka, in Donetsk region.
  • Vasily Gorkush- Defender from the Brody Community. Basil was a grenade launcher as a grenade launcher of the 24th Separate Mechanized Brigade named after King Danylo. He died on September 16, 2022 in Mykolaiv region.
  • Eugene Black- A resident of the village of Ponikovitsa. After a full -scale invasion, he joined the Armed Forces. He was a shooter. He died on February 6, 2023 during the combat mission in the Severodonetsk direction. At the age of 31.
  • Mar’an Mishchuk- A resident of the village of Ponikovitsa. He was a soldier of a mechanized battalion. He died on September 29, 2023 near Bakhmut as a result of artillery shelling. He was 26 years old.
  • Vladimir Savonic- Originally from the village of Ponikovitsa. He was the headquarters, the head of the radio station of the engineering and technical company. He died on December 14, 2023 in the Zaporozhye direction.
  • Nicholas Gab- Defender from the village of Ponikovitsa. He participated in the OOS in a full -scale Russian offensive. Later, he returned to the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. He was the commander of the platoon of percussion unmanned aircraft complexes of the 80th separate airborne assault brigade. He died on February 8, 2024 near Bakhmut.

Earlier the ArmyinformreportedOn the creation of icons for the 112nd and 241th brigades of territorial defense of Kiev.
title: The seven soldiers from Lviv region were installed memorial plaques
description: It is reported by the Lviv Regional State Administration. In a mournful memorable ...
author: Army Inform
